title: Troll queues
body:
Heres my games for the last 3 weeks alone. not all of them but a good chunk.
Tonights ones though.
2 games, i jg, total 6 lanes losing, 3 inters, afk mid, troll adc.

but lets expand now. 
6 days ago
a jg that int feeds EVERY lane.
for amusement. his amusement.

kind reminder rito do nothing about the community.

7 days ago
AFK jg after inting mid
trolling sup
adc giving up because sup trolling

10 bucks on no one gets punished

9 days ago
AFK jg
ADC that intentionally baited ally team.

17 days ago (small break)
Game 1:
refusing to communicate/help team/anything TOP and MID.
got counter jungled hard, did my best but went full wood IV despite working with what I could.

Game 2:
int feeding top that then afk'd. obviously a booster.

20 days ago
Troll top who refused to help anyone. Proceeded to flame mid.
Afk jg.
afk adc after inting.
This is just ONE, 1, UNO game.

riot, instead of jerking each other off, how about fixing match making. 
giving me 4 irons per game to face against golds seems a little........
retarded.

little being an understatement.
